alert.note: Alert for Gove; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 11 at 7:59PM CDT until April 12 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 029 AND 042... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 029 Gove and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita. * Timing...Late Tuesday morning through sunset Tuesday evening. * Winds...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised on Tuesday. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
